issue.title: segtools-nucleotide-frequency prints unfriendly error message when Genomedata archive doesn't have sequence

content.raw:
Comment [#3](https://code.google.com/p/segtools/issues/detail?id=31#c3) originally posted by ericr86 on 2012-09-13T00:28:22.000Z:

This isn't really a bug but I think the error message should be friendlier so I'm reopening it. The error message should describe the real problem and not look inexplicable
